short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All Your Insurance Needs In One Tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compare My Insurance brings you your trusted third-party online insurance websites in the UK all in one tab! Get ready to buy and compare insurance policies for home, car, pets and more from the safety of your Chrome browser toolbar, without having to open multiple tabs or browsers. From MoneySupermarket to CompareTheMarket, access your favorite UK insurance sites in one tab with ease, while browsing the internet with a convenient search box powered by Bing.com

How to get started:
Compare My Insurance is a new tab extension which is integrated into Chrome to provide users access to insurance quotation websites in the UK in one place. Once it has been added to your browser from the Chrome Web Store, it will be displayed in your new tab from where you can use it. Once the extension is added, users will need to register or login into their respective accounts per the Terms stated by the respective websites. The extension does not store or share any personal information, financial details or authentication permissions. The search engine on the new tab will change to Bing.com once downloaded.

Features:
Seamless switching between MoneySuperMarket, CompareTheMarket, Confused.com and many more 
Custom web search bar powered by Bing.com 
Ease of navigation between third-party insurance sites 
Completely free to use

Permissions
It needs permission to allow new tabs to display the Compare My Insurance extension with the features including the access to third-party insurance providers and customised search. This extension does NOT ask for your login or password.

By clicking "Install Now", I accept and agree to install the "Compare My Insurance" extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use. Please refer to our Privacy Policy (https://mediastinct.com/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://mediastinct.com/terms-conditions/) or contact us at dev@mediastinct.com for any queries

Uninstallation:

To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate "Compare My Insurance", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Compare My Insurance", click the Remove button.

Disclaimer:
Compare My Insurance is not a part of any of the applications or websites added in this extension including comparethemarket, confused.com, moneysupermarket, uswitch, quotezone,and moneyexpert. It is an unofficial app (browser add-on) and independent project and functions only as a new tab extension that has been created to ensure that third-party insurance policies can be accessed and used at ease. Please, refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on the purpose and methods of our handling user data.
